294855237.name: sbb
294855237.ownDescription: It can show you your Favorites, or show the next connection to "Home", or show departures from your location (i.e. the closest chosen Bahnhof). Your Favorites are where you can actually really "search" for connections, but you have to add the route to your Favorites on the iPhone. You can than choose from the next 4 connections and look at their details, swiping between the different parts of your route between changes.

1067458275.ownDescription: This one is my favourite. ğŸ˜ You can basically just write anything on your watch face. You can also schedule it, even daily or weekly. Platform info while on the train, or sg you definitely have to buy and shouldn't forget, things like that... Basically you can put ANY info on it... So be creative! ğŸ˜ƒ
